com.salimov.yurii.controller.admin

Class AdminMainController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.controller.other.MainController
      • com.salimov.yurii.controller.admin.AdminMainController

  • @Controller
 @RequestMapping(value="/admin")
 @ComponentScan(basePackages="com.salimov.yurii.service")
public class AdminMainController
extends MainController
    The class implements a set of methods for working with main ModelAndView objects for admins. Class methods create and return modelsAndView, depending on the request. For the work used implementation of the interface AdminMVFabric interface.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    AdminMVFabric, CompanyService, UserService, ResponseService, SenderService

      • sendMessage

        @RequestMapping(value="/send_message",
                method=POST)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView sendMessage(@RequestParam(value="url")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String url,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="phone")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String phone,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String email,
                                                                                                                                      @RequestParam(value="message")
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String userMessage)
        Sends sender and redirects by url if it is not blank, otherwise by url /. Request mapping: /admin/send_message Method: POST
        Parameters:
        url - a url of the page which must be to redirect.
        name - a sender name.
        phone - a phone name.
        email - a email name.
        userMessage - a sender sender.
        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.
        See Also:
        SenderService

      • sendMessage

        @RequestMapping(value="/send_message",
                method=GET)
public void sendMessage()
                                                                                      throws org.springframework.data.mapping.model.IllegalMappingException
        The method throws an exception in the case of reference to it. The exception sender: "GET method in "/send_message" is not supported!" Request mapping: /admin/send_message Method: POST
        Throws:
        org.springframework.data.mapping.model.IllegalMappingException - thrown when an error occurs reading the mapping between object and datastore.

      • siteOff

        @RequestMapping(value="/site/off",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView siteOff(org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView modelAndView)
        Disables the site. And also clears the cache. Redirects by url /admin/menu. Request mapping: /admin/site/off Method: GET
        Parameters:
        modelAndView - a object of class ModelAndView for to update.
        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.

      • siteOn

        @RequestMapping(value="/site/on",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView siteOn(org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView modelAndView)
        Includes the site. Redirects by url /admin/menu. Request mapping: /admin/site/on Method: GET
        Parameters:
        modelAndView - a object of class ModelAndView for to update.
        Returns:
        The ready object of class ModelAndView.
